docs.title: Welcome to SmartTask Documentation
docs.text:
SmartTask is your smart companion for managing tasks, projects, and teams in one unified platform. This documentation will guide you through installation, usage, FAQs, and updates.

Whether you're a new user or an experienced one, you'll find helpful information to make the most of SmartTask.

docs.title: ❓ Is SmartTask free?
docs.text: Yes! SmartTask offers a free tier with essential features. Paid plans are available for teams.

docs.title: ❓ Does it work offline?
docs.text: The web app requires an internet connection, but the desktop version supports offline mode.

docs.title: ❓ How do I reset my password?
docs.text: Click “Forgot Password” on the login screen or visit https://smarttask.example.com/reset.

docs.title: System Requirements
docs.text:
• OS: Windows 10+, macOS Monterey+, or Linux
  • Python 3.7 or higher (for CLI users)

docs.title: 🖥️ Desktop App
docs.text: Download the SmartTask installer from the official website and follow the setup wizard.

docs.title: v1.2.0 – July 2025
docs.text:

docs.title: v1.1.0 – June 2025
docs.text:

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Launch SmartTask and log in with your credentials.

docs.title: Create a New Task
docs.text:
1. Click on "New Task"
  2. Enter task details
  3. Assign to team members
  4. Set due date and priority
  5. Click Save
